sentences.en: After the cremation, Eon's remains will be buried in his hometown - Busan.
sentences.cn: 火葬之后, 李炎的骨灰将安葬于故乡釜山.

sentences.en: But there's no denying her most distinctive claim to fp eon campus at this point.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,因著这一点,她在哈佛校园的出名,绝非浪得虚名.

sentences.en: EON Office Products Independent office products dealer, includes products and services, and design options.
sentences.cn: 独立的办公用品经销商, 包括产品和服务, 以及设计方案.

sentences.en: Gong Yoo arrived slightly over midnight on 23 rd at Eon's mourning hall located in the hospital.
sentences.cn: 孔刘于23日刚过零点时,来到李炎设于位在汉南洞的顺天祥大学附设医院内的灵堂.

sentences.en: Instructions on downloading eon and vida though cvs can be found on our code forum.
sentences.cn: 在我们的代码论坛里您可以通过cvs很 方便的找到EON和fida的下载.

sentences.en: Many people attending theand mourning for him shows Eon's good personality and popularity among friends.
sentences.cn: 反映了李炎平日的人德与好人缘,许多人参加告别式,哀悼他的过世.

sentences.en: My current screen saver has switched from EON to the default screen saver ( a blank screen ).
sentences.cn: 问:我屏幕保护由 EON 跳转到默认的屏幕保护程序了.

sentences.en: Nobody feels safe – from Eon and Siemens [ the two largest companies by market capitalisation ] downwards .
sentences.cn: 没人感到安全——从 Eon 和西门子 ( 市值最大的两家公司),到规模较小的公司都是如此.

sentences.en: Q . My current screen saver has switched from EON to the default screen saverblank screen.
sentences.cn: 我屏幕保护由eon跳转到默认的屏幕保护程序了.

sentences.en: Quality products, perfect service is the highest in China EON pursuit!
sentences.cn: 优质产品, 完美服务是EON在 中国的至高追求!

sentences.en: See our download page for further instructions on downloading and running eon.
sentences.cn: 请浏览我们的下载页面,您可以了解到更多关于下载、装、用方面的详情.

sentences.en: She met Eon briefly at work, and he then asked her out on a date.
sentences.cn: 她在工作的时候与恩有过短暂的接触, 恩邀请她出来约会.

sentences.en: She sat on until eon agreed to help.
sentences.cn: 她一直坐到有人同意帮忙为止.

sentences.en: The Ousters eon - long mutated humanoids bent on overthrowing the Hegemony.
sentences.cn: 驱逐者:经过万年进化、决心推翻霸权的猿人.

sentences.en: To correct this problem, you need to uninstall Eon and then reinstall from the web.
sentences.cn: 如果要修正这个问题, 您需要卸载EON, 然后重新下载客户端安装.

words.tran_cn: 永世；无数的年代；极长时期
